output: html_document

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(psrccensus)
library(sf)
library(dplyr)
library(psrcelmer)
```



```{r cars}
tract.big.tbl.21 <- psrccensus::get_acs_recs(geography='tract',table.names=c('B02011'),years=c(2021))
```

```{r pressure, echo=FALSE}

tract.lyr <- st_read_elmergeo('TRACT2020_NOWATER')
```


```{r}

create_tract_map(tract.tbl=tract.big.tbl.21, tract.lyr=tract.lyr,
map.title.position='topleft', legend.title='Asian Alone or in Combination Population',
legend.subtitle='ACS 2021 (5 yr)')

```
